Class Feeder

java.lang.Object
  UserCode.Behaviours.SpawnablePool
      UserCode.Game.Feeder
All Implemented Interfaces:
IUpdatable, ISpawnablePool, IEventListener
public class Feeder
extends SpawnablePool
implements IEventListener

Feeder implements ISpawnablePool & IEventListener, to provide a mouse-based 'feeder' behaviour.

0.1
